Andy, let me make you a prediction: If you pursue the research
direction th=
at you believe in, and I pursue the one that I believe in,
the world will b=
e a better place than if we all tried to do exactly
the same thing.  That i=
s the beauty of research.  But the way to make
something happen in research=
, the way to convince people of a point of
view, is simply to do it.  Why n=
ot give your theory a shot?  By all
means, broadening the applicability of =
NEAT and HyperNEAT would be
great.   If you have a theory on how to do it, =
you have my full support.

ken
